    Members

    static, constant cleanupYTextFormatting
    types/YText.js, line 408

    This function is experimental and subject to change / be removed.

    Ideally, we don't need this function at all. Formatting attributes should be cleaned up automatically after each change. This function iterates twice over the complete YText type and removes unnecessary formatting attributes. This is also helpful for testing.

    This function won't be exported anymore as soon as there is confidence that the YText type works as intended.

    static parent :Item
    types/YText.js, line 466

    Methods

    inner cleanupContextlessFormattingGap(transaction, item)
    types/YText.js, line 376

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    transaction Transaction
    item Item | null

    inner cleanupFormattingGap(transaction, start, end, startAttributes, endAttributes) → {number}
    types/YText.js, line 344

    Call this function after string content has been deleted in order to clean up formatting Items.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    transaction Transaction
    start Item
    end Item | null

    exclusive end, automatically iterates to the next Content Item
    startAttributes Map.<string, any>
    endAttributes Map.<string, any>

    This attribute is modified!
    Returns:
    number -

    The amount of formatting Items deleted.

    inner equalAttrs(a, b) → {boolean}

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description

    TextAttributes
    types/YText.js, line 488

    Attributes that can be assigned to a selection of text.

    Example
    {
    bold: true,
    font-size: '40px'
  }
